manifest.ext.name: Regex-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero-Hassle Regex Extraction & Validation - Test, extract, and validate regular expressions directly inside VS Code with real-time match previews, performance scoring, and built-in ReDoS detection.
manifest.command.test.title: Test Regex
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract Matches
manifest.command.validate.title: Validate Regex
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: Regex-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy extraction results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Regex-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
manifest.settings.performance.max-durati: Maximum allowed operation duration in milliseconds
manifest.settings.performance.max-memory: Maximum allowed memory usage in bytes
manifest.settings.regex.realtime-preview: Enable real-time regex match preview (future feature)
Enable ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service) vulnerability detection
Maximum number of matches to return (prevents excessive memory usage)
runtime.help.title: Regex-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a file with text content
2. Run "Regex-LE: Test Regex" (Ctrl+Alt+R / Cmd+Alt+R)
3. Enter a regex pattern
4. View results with matches and performance metrics
runtime.help.commands:
**Test**: Test a regex pattern against the active editor content
**Extract**: Extract all matches from the active editor
**Validate**: Validate a regex pattern and check for ReDoS vulnerabilities
**Settings**: Configure extension options
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No matches found?** Check your pattern syntax and flags
**Performance issues?** Enable performance monitoring in settings
**ReDoS warnings?** Review the pattern for nested quantifiers or exponential backtracking
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "Regex-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: ReDoS detection, performance monitoring, match limits, real-time preview
runtime.test.no-editor: No active editor. Please open a file first.
runtime.extract.no-editor: No active editor. Please open a file first.
runtime.error.parse.suggestion: Check the file format and try again
runtime.error.safety.suggestion: Consider adjusting safety thresholds in settings
runtime.error.performance.suggestion: Consider processing smaller files or adjusting performance settings
runtime.safety.file-size: File size ({0} bytes) exceeds safety threshold ({1} bytes)
runtime.safety.file-size.suggestion: Consider splitting the file or increasing the safety threshold in settings
runtime.safety.output-size: Output size ({0} lines) exceeds safety threshold ({1} lines)
runtime.safety.output-size.suggestion: Consider filtering results or increasing the threshold
